doc:
Vincent Gardenia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vincent_Gardenia 0 Vincent Gardenia (born Vincenzo Scognamiglio; January 7, 1920 – December 9, 1992) was an Italian-American stage, film, and television actor. He was nominated twice for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor, first for Bang the Drum Slowly (1973) and again for Moonstruck (1987). He also portrayed Det. Frank Ochoa in Death Wish (1974) and its 1982 sequel, as well as Mr. Mushnik in the musical film adaptation of Little Shop of Horrors (1986). Gardenia's other notable feature films include Murder Inc. (1960), The Hustler (1961), The Front Page (1974), Greased Lightning (1977) and Heaven Can Wait (1978). Vincent_Gardenia ( born Vincenzo_Scognamiglio ; January_7_,_1920 – December_9_,_1992 ) was an_Italian-American_stage , film , and television_actor . He was_nominated twice for the_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actor , first for Bang the_Drum_Slowly_(_1973_) and again for Moonstruck_(_1987_) . He also portrayed Det._Frank_Ochoa in Death_Wish_(_1974_) and its_1982_sequel , as_well_as Mr._Mushnik in the_musical_film_adaptation of Little_Shop of Horrors_(_1986_) . Gardenia 's_other_notable_feature_films include Murder_Inc. ( 1960_) , The_Hustler_(_1961_) , The_Front Page_(_1974_)_,_Greased_Lightning_(_1977_)_and_Heaven Can_Wait (_1978_) .
